column1: * 1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Kenneth Sisam (28 May 1938).
* 1964 - Tree and Leaf is first published in the UK.
* 1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to unknown recipient (28 May 1965).
* 1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Anthony D. Howlett.
* 1980 - Second edition of The Languages of Tolkiens Middle-earth is published.
:There are no known events on this day.Category:Datesfi:28. toukokuuta
